name: Phantasy Star Nova
description:
Phantasy Star Nova is an action-RPG game developed by Tri-Ace. It was originally released in 2014. SEGA published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Phantasy Star Nova on PS Vita.
It was produced by Hiroyuki Tamura, Satoshi Sakai and Yasuyuki Tsuzuki. Motoi Sakuraba scored the game.
